document_data.caption: A terrifying overseer.
document_data.name: Overseer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Overseers''' were among the most dangerous of the [[beholderkin]]. Rivaling the power of a [[hive mother]], an overseer resembled nothing more than a large mass of flesh or a tree with mouths on its trunk and eyes on its branches.

Overseers possessed powers similar to that of a hive mother and could control the actions of five to ten standard [[beholder]]s or five to twenty beholderkin. However, overseers could only control creatures of the same type. Thus, one overseer could control [[Death kiss|deathkisses]] or [[director]]s but not a combination of the two beholder types.
document_data.Society: A few overseers existed in the beholder city of [[Zokir]], though they were rarer there than in other beholder colonies.
document_data.History: [[Calimshan|Calishite]] records suggest that overseers may have fought in the [[Eye Tyrant Wars]] and earlier wars in [[Calimshan]], along with other beholder abominations.
